faceCategory.name: Nirvana Color Face Perfect Liquid Foundation - Light Honey F04
faceCategory.description: Nirvana Color features four new full coverage yet buildable foundations that give a flawless, long-lasting finish, cover up blemishes, and conceal imperfections and dark circles. These foundations are made to complement Bangladeshi skin tones.

faceCategory.name: Farmasi Soft Focus BB Powder 02 Medium
faceCategory.description: BB All-in One compact powder is a light and soft powder which gives the skin soft look by naturally covering imperfections. Apply over a BB cream for buildable coverage or alone for a matte finish.

faceCategory.name: L.A. Girl Pro BB Cream GBB942 Light
faceCategory.description: HD PRO BB Cream is formulated without parabens and made fragrance-free to pamper sensitive skin and lavishly nourish skin with added Vitamin B3, C and E. The silky formula covers a wide range of skin tones with eight diverse shades. This is your all-in-one skin beautifier that primes, moisturizes and enhances skin tone.

All shades feature the same soft, blendable formula and matte finish that made original Hoola a cult-favorite. The entire Hoola bronzer collection ranges from light to deep so you can sweep on a natural-looking bronze. Comes complete with a built-in mirror and powder brush for a sunless & seamless application.

faceCategory.name: Wazih Organic Lavender Essential Oil
faceCategory.description: Lavender Essential Oil Lavender essential oil is a type of essential oil. Lavender is a very popular and popular flower name from which this essential oil is obtained. Its soft fragrance takes away everyone's mind. There is no pair of lavender oil for soft fragrance, moisturizing skin and keeping hair beautiful.

faceCategory.name: Garnier Skin Active Micellar Clear Water
faceCategory.description: This cleanser is surprisingly powerful yet gentle to skin. It is specially formulated to effectively cleanse, remove makeup, and refresh skin. Like a magnet, micelles capture and lift away dirt, oil and makeup without harsh rubbing, leaving skin perfectly clean, and refreshed without over-drying.

faceCategory.name: Swiss Beauty Select High on Blush - 01 Pretty Peach
faceCategory.description: The Swiss Beauty Select High on Blush has a natural matte finish that emulates the texture and appearance of your skin.
